identity.mission: Create a high-clarity, official yet modern tool for taxi drivers in Asturias.
principles: Clarity is King: Legibility under sunlight and night conditions is priority #1.
Thumb-First Design: All primary actions must be reachable with one hand.
Official Aesthetic: The app generates legal documents; it must look trustworthy, not playful.
Speed: Interactions must be instant. No unnecessary animations that slow down the workflow.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (High Contrast). Dark Mode optional but secondary.
colors.gradients: None. Use solid colors for maximum clarity and 'official' feel.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Gap-4 or Gap-6 for grids.
layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto for Mobile App (/app). max-w-7xl mx-auto for Admin (/admin).
layout.radius: rounded-lg (8px) for cards, rounded-full for buttons.

buttons.primary: bg-[#701111] text-white hover:bg-[#5a0d0d] h-12 text-lg font-semibold rounded-full shadow-md active:scale-95 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-[#D4AF37] text-[#701111] hover:bg-[#FFFDF5] h-12 text-lg font-semibold rounded-full

inputs.default: h-14 text-lg bg-white border-stone-300 focus:border-[#701111] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#701111] rounded-lg px-4
inputs.label: text-stone-600 font-medium mb-1.5 block text-sm uppercase tracking-wide

cards.default: bg-white border border-stone-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6
cards.interactive: bg-white border border-stone-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-[#D4AF37] hover:shadow-md transition-all cursor-pointer

navigation.mobile_bottom: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white border-t border-stone-200 h-16 flex items-center justify-around z-50
navigation.admin_sidebar: fixed left-0 top-0 h-full w-64 bg-[#1C1917] text-stone-300

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for floating actions. Avoid large diffuse shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid stone-200. Use #D4AF37 (Gold) for active states or highlights.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise on the background (#F5F5F4) to give a 'paper' feel.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Use stroke-width={2} for clarity.

motion.micro_interactions: Active scale down (0.98) on buttons. Input focus ring expansion.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 ratio. Text on Gold background is forbidden (use Gold for borders only).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'Chivo' and 'IBM Plex Sans' fonts immediately.
2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js with the custom colors (Primary: #701111, Secondary: #D4AF37).
3. LAYOUT: Create two distinct layouts: 'AppLayout' (Mobile, Bottom Nav) and 'AdminLayout' (Desktop, Sidebar).
4. FORMS: Build the Registration form as a multi-step wizard. Step 1: Personal, Step 2: License, Step 3: Vehicle.
5. DASHBOARD: The User Dashboard must use Tabs (New Sheet, History, Settings).
6. PDF: Prepare the 'Export PDF' UI to look like a preview of a physical paper document.
7. ADMIN: The Admin table must support bulk actions (Approve Users).
8. CRITICAL: Do not use gradients. Stick to flat, high-contrast colors.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly (only for overlays).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
